pageProps.body:
You’re ready to take the next step, and you may not be sure if we’re a fit. That’s ok. The most meaningful engagements I’ve had started with an open conversation.

If you’re a purpose-driven organization seeking to connect with more people through product and stories, or if you're interested in contributing a story to The Daring, I would love to hear from you.

Email me@ioanafriedman.com to connect.
